case.state: Oh? What's this? Are we playing a game?
What do we have here? A game? Can I play?
What's going on here? Something fun?
Yes! Let's play! Let's play! I was just feeling bored!
"Strip Poker," huh? I'll play by your silly rules, so long as you don't bore me!
This should be fun! Come on! Let's start already!
Hmm... how about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
Yes, I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. That's what I need.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ now. Come on! Come on!
Oh, I'll keep you in suspense. It's more fun that way!
Do your best. I don't know if it will matter, but give it a try anyway. For fun!
Let's go! Let's go! Let's see who lost this time!
... You. I think it's you who's going to lose.
No need to be nervous. Just take a deep breath and prepare to lose.
Nfufu! Show me your cards! I want to know who lost!
Hmm... which one is the loser? I wonder...
Don't forget to put a little effort into it when you lose.
Let's have you struggle some more.
I'm glad you've kept it interesting, but just don't forget you're going to lose.
Don't overthink your next move. It's not going to matter anyway.
Please, make me put you back in your place. It's more fun that way!
You're out of your depth!
Oh, look! Time for me to be entertained again!
Do you feel that chill? You will...
You're in way over your head!
Nfufu. Exciting little game...
Hm? What's the hold-up? Wouldn't you rather lose now than later?
Even the strong need just a little bit of luck.
Are you ready to take the plunge?
Don't stop now! Let's keep cruising along!
How do humans come up with these silly little games?
Winning isn't everything, but it is more fun that way.
Maybe you could beat me! Just maybe! Winning is more fun when it's difficult!
Underestimating you would be foolish. I know better than that by now.
What's the fun in worrying? It's fun to watch you do it! That's the fun!
Show me a good time...
Just need to stay cool...
Nfufu! Let's see if you can best me again!
Go ahead and surprise me. Just don't mess it up...
No more overwhelming victory. At least humiliating you is worth the effort.
I like this game! All these dumb rules keep it exciting!
Hmph... coming up dry...
Would have been a lot better if I got what I wanted...
This might be exciting...
Well this seems more than a little fishy...
Tch. It's so dusty up here...
I do better in the water...
I guess I am a little out of my element up here.
Ugh, what's with the lousy luck?
This isn't helping with my killer comeback!
Once again, I'm struggling as things start heating up...
Oh, this isn't going as perfectly as I imagined....
You're really making me work for it, huh?
It doesn't matter! There's still no escape from your defeat!
Tch. How frustrating...
Must be all this dry air throwing me off...
At least this is better than just being bored...
Nfufu. Thank you. A warrior must always be at the ready, don't you agree?
I am a reploid, ~nephenee~. A reploid. A synthetic being made to aid and protect humanity.
I'm well accustomed to fighting with it on; moreover, it helps me maneuver in the water.
I'm a hero, ~nephenee~, aren't I allowed to be a little conceited now and then? And is it really conceit when I'm actually so great?
The ocean is my home. I try not to leave too often, but sometimes the fight or the fun or the two at once are surface-side.
You've proven more competent than I first thought, even for a bumpkin.
Oh? It's my turn? Okay! Here we go!
Looks like it's my turn! This part should be fun too!
Too bad! Looks like I can't win them all, huh? Nfufu!
Not going down without a fight, huh? I can appreciate that!
Oh, you got me again. Not bad. Maybe this will stay interesting.
Me again? Okay then, here I go!
Got me again. I bet you think you deserve a reward. Let's just stick with the usual, okay?
Nfufu. It's my turn again! Seems I shouldn't underestimate your determination.
Maybe you just got lucky again, but a win is a win. I'll give you what you want.
Nobody can completely control their luck, so savor whatever victories you can get.
See? This is why I'm bothering to stick around. I want to see just how close you get to taking me out!
Nfufu... I'm impressed, but not surprised. Fine, here's another reward for your efforts.
Nfufu! Well done! I hope you don't give up just because you're getting something you've wanted so bad...
I had a feeling it would come to this. Very well, you have the reward you so deeply desire: my respect. Oh, and a closer look at my body.
What is it that drives you? Is it that you just don't want to lose? Or is there something you desperately are trying to see before you do?
You've kept things fun and exciting for me this whole time. Losing like this... I don't think I mind.
This has been more fun than I imagined. Looks like I'll have the perfect chance to show my gratitude.
Fine. You've come this far. I'm more than happy to reward you for keeping me entertained.
That's just how it goes. I didn't think I'd get out of this without a scratch.
Hmm? It's me? Okay! I can show myself off a little bit.
So much for a total victory. Oh well. It'll be more fun if I get to strip a little too!
Oh, this silly little game. Okay, here I go again.
Losing the first time was kind of fun. I was actually hoping I might get another chance to lose.
Nfufu. I'll go again. I'd be glad to, even. It certainly keeps things interesting.
You're making this harder than I thought you would. Take that as a compliment.
Am I going to have to start taking this more seriously? I don't want you to think I'm push-over.
You're determined to keep this interesting, huh? I can appreciate that.
These human games are trickier than they seem on the surface...
H-how frustrating! You're just getting lucky!
Now this is a league too far. What am I doing wrong?
Hmm... maybe a little peek at paradise will take a little of the fight out of you...
Whether it's luck or sheer determination, I guess I have to admit you've got me fighting against the current. Fine, here's a reward...
Silly little game. This is the entire point, right? Will your will to fight be depleted if I do this for you?
Placing me right on the edge of victory and defeat? Exciting...
Enjoy your luck while it lasts. You haven't seen the last of me yet!
I didn't imagine I'd have this much trouble. This game is so stimulating. I think I love it...
Very well, I'll go ahead and strip. Just don't get too used to it, okay?
There's a first time for everything. Even I'm not perfectly lucky.
Hmm... stripping could be fun. I don't think I mind losing this round so much.
... Fine, I'll take another turn. Honestly, I think it would be fun if you lost a little more.
Of course. You didn't get enough of me the first time. Okay, watch carefully this time.
Oh, poor me. I guess it will be fun to strip again, at least.
Don't get cocky, alright? Your luck could just as easily start sinking...
Fine, fine. I'll keep playing along. Just don't count on this continuing.
I just can't seem to find an edge. Maybe I should do something about that...
I'm not seriously getting beat? A-at this ridiculous game?
That's nothing but luck! It's just too dusty up here for me to fully concentrate! That's all it is!
This is dumb. Why aren't I winning?
But I'm not supposed to be losing! I'm superior! Me!
So frustrating! So frustrating! So frustrating! So frustrating!
What's with all this rotten luck? Why can't I destroy you?!
T-this isn't over! Don't think you've beaten me!
It's nothing but luck! This isn't fair! I should come out on top!
I'm not going out like this! Not for a second! This is the last time I'm going to lose!
The best protection for something as fragile as you is for someone like me to stand between you and danger.
That is what it's designed for, but it doesn't explain why you're so weirdly attached to it.
I always have access to the Frost Javelin if I need it, but I can't imagine I will. If I thought this place was dangerous, I wouldn't be playing this little game.
Hmm. Perhaps this is just a concept that is above your understanding.
I wouldn't really know. I don't really take criticism from my lessers. I don't get a lot of gratitude either. I destroy the enemy and move along.
Nfufu. Maybe being out of my element for so long has put me a little on edge. I mean, what else could it be?
Nfufu. I just don't know what to make of you. You give me such a hard time but you don't even understand what I am.
I don't get a lot of chances to interact with humans like this. Most of them are afraid of reploids.
I am a little surprised a human would want to play a game like this with a reploid. Normally you're too terrified.
Never been invited to play a human game before. Usually you're so wary of reploids.
I don't normally let anyone see my like this. Only my brothers and Master X have had the privilege.
Yes, the helmet does come off. Consider yourselves lucky, as only the other guardians have ever seen me like this.
Lucky you. You get to see my full, unimpeded beauty. Such a rare sight that only a select few have seen it.
I hope this doesn't take too long for me to win. I don't like being out of the water for too long.
It is a little hard for me to relax here on the surface. It's much better to be underwater where I can just float around...
Too bad we can't play this underwater, but this seems fun enough to stay on the surface for. Just not too long.
As a reploid designed to serve humanity, I'm as human as possible so that I might better understand them...
Surprised by how human I am? Not all reploids are, but it is critical to my mission that I'm able to understand humans...
So why would a reploid be so similar to humans? It's simple, really: it helps me better understand and thus better serve them...
How much do you even know about reploids? Are you wondering "what is even going on under there?" Perv.
Are you excited to see all the ways a reploid is different from a human? All the ways we're better?
While you're ogling my body, please don't forget that I'm a reploid. It's just not fair to other humans to compare me to them.
So, here's the answer to your big question: yes, I have a vagina. Pretty, isn't it?
Humans have called reploids "soulless war-machines." Maybe that's right, but why would a "soulless war-machine" have a pretty little pussy like this?
Some reploids have tails. Some reploids have wings. Some have horns. Me? I've got tight little cunt.
This has nothing to do with being grown, ~nephenee~. It's just a matter of who's best for the job.
Doesn't seem to be keeping you safe from being humiliated!
Did you happen to see how I got my helmet off without crying?
Of course I don't. I don't lug it around with me when I don't need it. If and when I do, it will come to me.
Nfufu. There's no need to be jealous! Not yet, at least!
Sure, but there I am getting my socialization in. Don't ruin it by being all gloomy. Say more of your funny country-isms.
N-no! I'm flawless, okay? Flawless!
Amazing. That's even worse than I was expecting.
Of course, there's no reason for a human to be afraid of me. I've pledged to protect humanity. Still, I will absolutely stomp you at this game.
I'm glad there are humans who aren't so afraid of reploids they won't play with us! Alright, now I'm going to beat you terribly at this game of yours!
As a reploid pledged to guard humanity, I'm no threat to you, so just relax. Oh, but I will completely destroy you at this little game.
Just make sure you don't bore me or I'll just go straight back to the ocean.
Do humans even have underwater games? They couldn't be very long games since you can't hold your breath all that long.
I guess the cards would all float away if we were underwater. Well, all the best underwater games involve racing anyway.
So, do I seem more human this way? Try and remember that I'm a reploid.
I could almost pass for a human girl like this, couldn't I? Even if you fall in love with me, make sure to remember I'm a reploid!
So, what do you think? Didn't think a reploid could be so human and captivating? I bet that's what you're thinking!
Of course, this game wouldn't be at all interesting to me if I wasn't interested in your bodies either...
"Perfect" isn't a word I usually use to describe myself, but you can if you want!
Well, comparison is inevitable. Maybe it wouldn't hurt if we call got a close look at all the differences...
Still, a reploid is obviously different from a human in a few ways. And by "different" I mean "better."
I'm even receptive to sexual stimuli. I think of it as a gift to have a body with the capacity for such pleasure...
Even if you understand why I'm so close to being human, I'm sure the next question is "why is she so beautiful?"
I know my body may stimulate your biological desire to procreate, but all attempts to do so with me would prove futile. No matter how many times you try it...
See? It even gets moist when I'm aroused. ..
While I'm sure it's very much like a human's, I've never actually gotten a human's opinion on it...
Have fun, ~target~.
Nfufu! Time to put on a show for us!
Oh, ~target~, how unfortunate. I just don't see you being able to beat me.
I hope you're not holding back just because I'm a woman.
There's no pressure, ~target~. Not like I haven't seen what a human man looks like naked before.
Oooh, ~target~'s turn? He's pretty cute!
Poor ~target~. There's your drop of pity, so go ahead and strip!
Let's see how you handle this...
Poor, poor, ~target~. Then again, I have no pity left for you.
Nfufu! I want ~target~ to get his comeuppance...
You still have so much to offer, ~target~. So much you owe...
You're not getting away that easily...
Yes. Good. Someone needs to pay.
I might not be the winner, but at least I can still see ~target~ get what's coming to him.
Not so tough anymore, huh?
Serves him right...
That's what you get for getting cocky...
Mmph... I'm reminded of my failure...
I could use a little entertainment...
Let's have it, ~target~. Don't disappoint me...
Try as you might, a human is just no match for a reploid. That's just how it is.
You're going to have to to better than that if you want to win. Maybe you'd rather lose and sate your lust? Typical.
Are you even trying? You'd better put more effort into getting your clothes off.
You might not go down easy, but you will go down, human.
Boohoo, ~target~. Strip.
Go ahead, ~target~. Let's see what you're made of.
You are pretty for a human. Too bad about your poor luck!
Human women have certain charms to them. I don't think they'll be replaced by reploids... yet.
Hmm... it remains to be seen if you're really a worthy opponent.
Don't worry, ~target~. I know what a naked human woman looks like.
Nfufu! ~Target~ lost! That's just too bad for her! Nfufu!
I could pretend to pity you, but I know your time is precious.
Let's see what a human woman is capable of...
I'm the last one here you should expect to take it easy on you.
I'm not going to miss out on my chance to humiliate you. It's far too fun...
Are you getting distracted by your urges? Or maybe you're just giving into them?
Remember not to bore me...
So sorry, ~target~. Seems a human woman just pales in comparison to a reploid.
Complain if you want, but the result is the same.
Serves her right...
Not so easy for humans now, is it?
Maybe it does all boil down to luck...
Well... if you're willing to put on a show...
Why by a good sport when being a sore loser is so much more cathartic?
Not so hot now, are you?
I'm not leaving until someone pays for my humiliation. ~Target~ is certainly on the list of acceptable targets.
Oh, the faces you'll make when you finally lose it all...
I'm watching someone else fail and ~target~ is very, very deserving of it.
I feel for you ~target~, I really do; however, in a larger sense I want you to pay for contributing to my humiliation.
Where has all your good fortune run off to now?
So that's it? Nothing happens? Boooring...
I'm sorry. Did I forget to specifically request not to be bored?
You're just delaying the inevitable...
Isn't this game supposed to be exciting? What is exciting about this?
Hm, small effort for a small result...
I fail to see how ~clothing.ifPlural(these things|this thing)~ is an impediment to your masturbating.
Is that all you have to show us? Really?
Are you not driven mad with lust yet? Do you really not want to lose so badly?
... Fine, fine, just get it over with.
Clearly we'll just have you lose again!
It's no fun unless you're willing to suffer just a little bit. And then a little bit more...
Don't think for a moment that you're about to get away with that pitiful display.
... I guess it's still worth it to try and wring more out of you.
Squander your opportunity to impress me. See if I care.
You must have more to offer. What will it take to pry it out of you?
You're not cool enough to get away with being this lame.
Still... I have to respect someone who doesn't give up easily...
That's boring. You're boring me.
If you're trying to discourage me from defeating you... it's working.
This is not what I am enduring this dry, dusty place to see...
You'll never win if you don't take risks.
Why don't you just leave that on? Get to the good stuff already...
Is that all you have to show us? Really?
You wouldn't rather, I don't know, do something interesting right about now?
Right, right take your time. Just nevermind that it's our time too.
Why don't we continue? I think ~target~ deserves to lose again as quickly as possible.
You will have another chance to be properly humiliated.
It doesn't matter in the end. Don't think for a second I'm actually just going to let you defeat me.
It really is fine. I'll just keep the momentum going...
Showing off your lucky you are is not as impressive as you think.
There's no escaping your inevitable fall...
Can we move on any faster from this?
Sorry, ~target~, but remember that I'm a reploid. I'm not going get all sentimental about every little trinket.
Go ahead. Get your ~clothing~ off. I'll wait...
I guess this is better than nothing.
Even if you take your time stripping, I won't take my time defeating you.
You'd be worthier of effort if you had a bit more daring in you.
Meh. Fine. Just know I'm not impressed.
This is just the start! Don't forget!
Little by little, the tide comes in...
Relish your safety while you can...
How many more of those have you got in you? Let's find out!
Don't be shy, ~target~. We're going to see everything anyway!
You just haven't realized yet that you're about to get swept away!
Feel a chill? That's your last chance at victory dying out in the cold!
Oh, yes. Seeing more of you would be ideal...
Don't you want to show off? Why let the chance be swept away?
Why not dive in head-first? The cold shock might be invigorating...
Whether you feel shame or pride in your nudity, you'll be in it anyway. Consider just speeding up the process.
Why be modest? Why not take this chance to really let loose?
I understand going piece by piece... but I still think you could make it more interesting.
You can go bit by bit, but you'll only be agonizing yourself.
Hmm... I still think you could make this interesting. You just might be worthy...
Still waiting for you to get to the good part...
So you've got a hard shell to crack, but apply enough pressure...
Oh, when will you share your pretty little secrets with us?
Still just a little too comfortable...
Hm, neat trick... for a human.
Oh? Something to bash things with? Seems a human ought to use something that puts more distance between you and danger.
Nfufu. That's cute. Weapons designed for humans are so amusing...
Have I gotten into your head yet? Do you feel yourself getting psyched out?
The tide is creeping up on you, ~target~. How's your swimming?
Maybe this is the beginning of the end for you.
All it takes is one little slip and suddenly you can't win again!
If you weren't ready to share, then you wouldn't be playing with us. Could you just be teasing?
Are you beginning to feel the excitement? Isn't it getting you going?
Isn't it frustrating to have so much stuff in the way of being free? Wouldn't you rather just skip to the end?
Don't you hear the siren call of desire? Singing... singing...
Oooh, now it's getting interesting.
Getting ready for high waters?
Someone wants to rise to the challenge...
Oh? Way to keep it exciting, ~target~!
Hmm, come on in. The water's fine...
Such a strange game, but you can't argue with the results.
Of course I am curious to see how you're built...
So your luck is terrible? At least you've got an attractive body for us to see...
This is nice, but I'm going to need to extract even more from you...
... No, I still want more.
Now we can really begin to have some fun...
But there's still so much more for you to show us. Time to lose again.
Oooh... is that a bit of thaw I'm feeling?
Well done, but I hope you're not anticipating with getting away with just that...
Nfufu. Embarrassed yet? I still think you need some more teasing...
Now we're having fun!
Oh, you are certainly worthy of defeat...
After you've got your ~clothing~ off, maybe you'd like to take a nice, refreshing swim!
Well, isn't this a treat? I'm not around many human women and female reploids are incredibly uncommon nowadays.
See, this is why I wanted to play with you! I knew it wouldn't stay dull!
Well, well, won't we make a fine pair of specimens...
Finally. I'm so very curious as to how you're put together.
Naturally I'm curious. Clearly you're made of different stuff than me.
There comparison between is is going to be quite fascinating considering there's no one and nothing quite like me...
Now how am I going to get you into the water...
Hmm... I never gave much though to what my preferences are when it comes to bodies...
This is a whole different sort of excitement...
This is good... but I'm still in the mood for something a bit more personal.
Are you sure you weren't designed to be lovely?
You're quite the catch, but there's nothing in the ocean that can compete with me!
Nfufu. Let's play a little more...
Let's not have you stop there. I still think there are some far more interesting sights you can show us.
Oh? Does this mean you want me to take you seriously?
Don't hold back! You're not going to need ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ when I get you into the water!
This is really the least you could do if you wanted me to view you as a sexual prospect.
Nfufu! Making you take off your clothes is fun! Now let's see your embarrassed face!
If you're taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off anyway, then maybe we should take this into the water...
Not too fast now. You need to make this all worth my while...
If you think it'll be good enough to impress me, then go right ahead...
Go ahead and submit yourself to my judgment. I can only promise to be fair.
Nfufu. Now I won't be able to stop until I see your defeated face...
Hmm... someone is looking utterly defenseless...
You're even less capable than I expected, but there are other factors that make you entertaining.
Nfufu. It's decided. It will be worthwhile to continue putting you through your paces.
Seeing a man like this... does awaken something...
I'd love to get a feel, if you can tolerate an icy touch...
Hmm, now I'm the one feeling a chill...
Nfufu. Maybe I can find a use for you...
Biological reproduction. So primitive, but so fascinating.
Sexual organs are superfluous on reploids. We have far more elegant and efficient methods of reproduction.
Ostensibly, this is some measure of your viability as a mate, right?
Poor ~target~. Made to expose his most vulnerable part and subject himself to base humiliation. What fun!
Normally, I don't much care for this sort of thing, but right now...
Yes! Show us! Show us! Don't you dare be a disappointment!
Surely you're not nervous? Not after how far we've come?
Finally! A way to get your true and honest opinion about how you're feeling!
Hm. Seems genetics were unkind to you.
So you're a poor specimen in the end? I could have guessed.
No, no, I'm actually not disappointed. To be disappointed would have required me actually expecting something of substance in the first place.
Isn't it kind of small? So you're not just a loser, you're a pathetic loser?
Oh, well, that's good to know. If I was going to engage in intercourse, I'd rather it be with somebody worthwhile.
Too bad, ~target~, but bigger is better. More strength. More stamina. More speed. Just more everything. You are... less! Nfufu!
It takes confidence to play this game with such a pathetic showing, but I think it's more likely that you're just an idiot!
See, if you had been designed for intercourse, you would have been given tools that would actually allow you to properly execute that function. Not whatever that is.
Ooh. Not bad. I suppose it wouldn't be a waste of time to test your competence as a lover.
Nfufu. There is something enticing about having a man's penis lain bare in front of you...
Well, it certainly looks adequate. I wonder if that can be said for its other qualities.
Hmm, your humiliation is lacking, but this part of you is... satisfactory.
Curiosity just leading into more curiosity...
So, is that where you're feeling all of your yearning?
I did not expect to feel so... interested...
Seems you are worthy of taking down...
Whatever designer crafted you seems to have intended you for breeding...
A penis that size is quite perverse, ~target~...
It would be my preference to work with something that can really make a splash...
No wonder you were willing to play. You wanted to show off your toy...
You're equipped with the right stuff...
But does he have the strength and stamina to match...
You... might be more than worthy...
It might be difficult, but that could make it all the more pleasurable...
This is something I'd been curious about...
I had been thinking about those this whole time...
See, I've been meaning to say something about those...
The human fascination with breasts is well documented. Their preferences always seem to skew towards the... barbaric.
I do not personally understand the human interest in this part of the anatomy. The attachment of ego to it is ridiculous... a-and pointless!
There's no point in comparing this part of a human with a reploid. Yours serve a biological function while mine are purely aesthetic. Understand? Good...
I know this is very fascinating for humans, but for me it's... it is just below my interests... t-that is all.
~Target~! Let us agree that there is no hierarchy when it comes to breast size! It is a purely random and inconsequential! It doesn't mean anything!
Y-you don't have to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off, ~target~. It should not prove a hindrance to masturbation. You could lose with it on...
Just remember: reploids and humans are still fundamentally different. Th-the standard of quality between the two is objectively different!
Right, right. This was also inevitable. Let's remember that ~target~ is the one who lost and is therefore the object of ridicule. Not anyone else. Just her.
The fact that we're the same is just proof that small is just the better design! Don't you think?
It seems we share some design philosophy. This type of body is much better for us, don't you agree?
Your body is the only type that makes sense for us! It's the best, wouldn't you agree?
Isn't this the form best suited for a woman? Sleek and refined? No unnecessary burdens?
Good to know there are humans with such splendid design.
Beautiful. Not a fault to be found. You have a body everyone can enjoy.
Oh, dear ~target~, never change. It would be a crime to mess with perfection.
Well, I must say you are a shining example of human beauty--- no, of beauty full stop!
As if your body were designed by a committee determined to reach nothing less than perfection!
I hope you are aware just how perfect you are. It is remarkable that a human subject to so many random variables in their design could be so beautifully proportioned.
For you, ~target~, I had a notion you were a beautiful piece of work from the very beginning! Anyone could tell just from looking!
Why were you made with a chest like that? What possible function could it serve?
Whenever they made you they decided to give you such an indecent form. I assume you were designed by a committee of perverts.
I just don't understand why you would be designed with a chest like that. I can only assume you were intended to serve some sexual purpose...
Yes, fine, very nice. Let's not get ourselves all worked up about them.
I'm sure you believe you're more than adequate. I'm not saying you're not, just that I'm sure you know that you are...
This is fairly standard for a human, right? No need to go overboard with the praise...
Yes, yes, very attractive. Highly desirable. We can move right along.
M-my body's form serves a purpose. Unnecessary ballast would slow me down in the water...
N-nothing wrong with a body like yours. I just fail to see the rational behind excess...
Yours aren't even that big, but they're still... bigger...
I don't get what the huge deal is. It's not like they're that much bigger...
... Why were they made so big? Why did I come out so... not big?
I-It's obvious some boob-loving human designed your body! Y-you're just the product of some pervert with no ethics and b-bad taste!
M-maybe if I wasn't designed to be so much like the other guardians, then I could have been more... more.
... If I had a chest like that... I'd float...
S-so unnecessary... s-s-so frustrating...
I-I'm supposed to be superior, so why are hers...
W-whatever! You're still a loser you... you floatation device!
N-not better, just different. Definitely not better...
Y-yeah?! W-well, get over yourself!
Energy crystals have zero fat content, unlike whatever it is you've been eating...
